content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ home services. I understand you need electrical work done. Could you please tell me your name to get started?
Screw this crap, just send someone over now!
I’m here to help you get this scheduled. Could you please provide your name so I can assist you better?
Why the hell do you need my name? Just fix my damn wiring!
I understand you want this fixed quickly. To help schedule the visit promptly, I need some basic info like your name and address. Could you please share your address?
Forget it, you’re all slow and useless. Don’t bother contacting me again!
I’m sorry to hear that. I will mark your number to avoid further contact. If you need help in the future, please reach out. Have a good day.
